listitem.para: Outputs a list describing the current font that is used by the LABEL command.

This output is a list of the form [[FaceName] Height Width Orientation Weight Italic Underline StrikeOut CharSet OutPrecision ClipPrecision Quality PitchAndFamily]. See SETLABELFONT for a description of each member of this list.

listitem.programlisting: SETLABELFONT [[Times New Roman] -24 0 0 400 0 0 0 0 3 2 1 18] SHOW LABELFONT [[Times New Roman] -24 0 0 400 0 0 0 0 3 2 1 18]
